synopsis.text:
Satomi Okawa, a captivating keyboardist, and Go Kato, the charismatic lead singer of the up-and-coming rock band Bee Hive, cross paths with the hardworking and resilient Yakko Mitamure. Having lost her mother at a young age, Yakko now helps run her father's Okonomiyaki restaurant while attending university classes in the evening. Her life takes an unexpected turn when she encounters Hashizo Kato, a young boy accompanied by his peculiar, pancake-loving cat Juliano.

As Yakko delves deeper into the world of Hashizo and his brother Go, she finds herself torn between the enigmatic allure of Satomi and the magnetic charm of Go. With a heart that yearns for just one, Yakko's journey unfolds through a series of events filled with love, jealousy, and the electrifying energy of rock 'n' roll. Set in Osaka, this anime explores the complexities of relationships and the exhilarating spark of newly-born stars.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
